headline: Show HN: Kcaps.app – a tool to design keyboard shortcut images
description:
Hi HN!

While working on a project that requires some images of keyboard shortcuts to be put in documentation, I came up with the idea of this small design tool.

kcaps.app is quite simple, however, it provides a number of color schemes and allows users to quickly print or press keyboard combinations and download images as a result.

I hope it will be helpful for someone else :)
